010package imagingbook.lib.filters;
011
012import imagingbook.lib.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
013
014
015/**
016 * Generic linear convolution filter implemented
017 * by extending the GenericFilter class.
018 */
019public class LinearFilter extends GenericFilter {
020        
021        private final float[][] kernel2d;
022//      private final float[] rgb = new float[3];
023
024        private final int kernelWidth, kernelHeight;    // width/height of the kernel
025        private final int kernelCtrX, kernelCtrY;       // center coordinates of the kernel
026        
027        public LinearFilter(float[][] kernel2d) {
028                this.kernel2d = kernel2d;
029                this.kernelWidth = kernel2d.length;
030                this.kernelHeight = kernel2d[0].length;
031                this.kernelCtrX = kernelWidth / 2;
032                this.kernelCtrY = kernelHeight / 2;
033        }
034        
035        // --------------------------------------------------------------
036        
037        @Override
038        public float filterScalar(ScalarAccessor ia, int u, int v) {
039                float sum = 0;
040                for (int j = 0; j < kernelHeight; j++) {
041                        int vj = v + j - kernelCtrY;
042                        for (int i = 0; i < kernelWidth; i++) {
043                                int ui = u + i - kernelCtrX;
044                                sum = sum + ia.getVal(ui, vj) * kernel2d[i][j];
045                        }
046                }
047                return sum;
048        }
049        
050//      @Override
051//      public float[] filterVector(ImageAccessor ia, int u, int v) {
052//              float sumR = 0; // sum of weighted red
053//              float sumG = 0; // sum of weighted green
054//              float sumB = 0; // sum of weighted blue
055//              for (int j = 0; j < kernelHeight; j++) {
056//                      int vj = v + j - kernelCtrY;
057//                      for (int i = 0; i < kernelWidth; i++) {
058//                              int ui = u + i - kernelCtrX;
059//                              float[] val = ia.getPix(ui, vj);
060//                              float w = kernel2d[i][j];
061//                              sumR = sumR + val[0] * w;
062//                              sumG = sumG + val[1] * w;
063//                              sumB = sumB + val[2] * w;
064//                      }
065//              }
066//              rgb[0] = sumR;
067//              rgb[1] = sumG;
068//              rgb[2] = sumB;
069//              return rgb;
070//              
071//              // apply the same filter independently to the 3 scalar-valued components:
072//              for (int k = 0; k < 3; k++) {
073//                      rgb[k] = filterPixel(ia.getComponentAccessor(k), u, v);
074//              }
075//              return rgb;
076//      }
077        
078        // --------------------------------------------------------------
079        
080        /**
081         * Returns the kernel of this filter as a 2D {@code float} array.
082         * @return the filter kernel
083         */
084        public float[][] getKernel() {
085                return this.kernel2d;
086        }
087}
